Description: Bead-net of blue glazed composition mummy beads strung on original fibre, long cylinder beads, disc beads, flat funeral amulets in the shape of 4 Sons of Horus and a winged scarab.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1994 Jan-Mar, Doncaster Museum & Art Gallery, Ancient Egypt 2006-2015 (Renewable), Glasgow, Kelvingrove, LT Loan
